text: 9.20 Ais 29.16, 45.9, 64.8 Nad pen anɨb agɨnɨgaban ak, nad bɨawl an tek mɨdɨl, God takaw nop ak day dɨnɨgaban? Day dɨl, takaw nop ak tɨbɨlɨkɨnɨgaban. Bɨ olap lum ak dɨl, sɨge cheg ak gɨlɨnɨgab ak, sɨge cheg ne bɨ anɨb ak nop pen agonɨmuŋ, Yɨp taynen anɨgɨl gɨlɨpan agɨl agonɨmuŋ tek ma lup. Mel yɨbɨl.
